job.title: Staff Software Engineer - Golang / AWS - Enterprise SaaS
job.description:
If you are a Senior-to-Staff level Software Engineer with proven experience building cloud-based Enterprise SaaS products at scale, please read on!
We are a leading cloud-native data protection SaaS company hiring for high-impact roles in our Engineering group, reporting to our Co-Founder/VP of Engineering!
We are a post-Series C stage startup with significant revenue with ~$200M in funding, and are growing steadily hiring a remote-first workforce.
Top Reasons to Work with Us
We have an incredible company culture which is collaborative, supportive, focuses on helping teammates grow their careers, and with complete transparency from the C-Suite to the entire company.
Solve Enterprise-scale engineering challenges processing metabytes of data.
What You Will Be Doing
Design and implement software components from the ground-up on a distributed, cloud-scale SaaS platform in a microservice-based architecture.
Use public cloud technologies to solve hard problems with a security-first mindset to build high throughput, scalable data ingestion and processing pipelines.
Work closely with product management and cross-functional teams such as UX, UI, and QE and Customer Success to deliver and maintain features and projects in a continuous integration and deployment manner.
Analyze and monitor metrics to construct benchmarks and iterate towards optimal performance while keeping focus on cost-efficient usage of cloud resources.
What You Need for this Position
Proven experience designing, implementing and supporting large-scale cloud services
So, if you are a Senior-to-Staff level Software Engineer with proven experience building cloud-based Enterprise SaaS products at scale, please apply today!
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Richard.Marion@CyberCoders.com
Richard Marion - Recruiting Manager - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
